name: 8 Words Search
description:
Find out the 8 words of the picture that are hidden in the grid

——— SIMPLE, FUN AND ADDICTIVE ! ———

The rules are simple : Find out the 8 words hidden in the grid.
Words can be read horizontally, vertically or diagonally.

Once the 8 words are found out, the next picure is unlocked with a new set of 8 words to guess. And so on through a brain teaser journey through various and colorfull photos.

——— HUNDREDS OF VARIED LEVELS ———

Solve hundreds of entertaining puzzles on various pictures topics :
Animals, objects, cooking, landscapes, holidays, people, sports, travels, art, design, celebrities ...
Train your vocabulary and observation skill through a gallery of colorful and various pictures.
With an new challenge at every image :
Will you guess each of the 8 words apart ?

——— GREAT FOR BREAKS! ———

With more than 300 beautifull pictures, the game provide numerous level of difficulties specially tailored for any kind of puzzle words and hidden object fan.

Great for coffee break, train journey, or even in boring meetings!

——— FREE DOWNLOAD ———

"Slide Art" is a free picture word game that is specially tailored for letter game and hidden objects fans .

« 8 words search » is part of the free download « 8 words » collection picture word games created by the french based studio YAQUA that totalize more than 2 millions download around the world.
